metadata.title: CVE-2016-1000108 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: yaws before 2.0.4 does not attempt to address RFC 3875 section 4.1.18namespace conflicts and therefore does not protect CGI applications fromthe presence of untrusted client data in the HTTP_PROXY environmentvariable, which might allow remote attackers to redirect a CGIapplication's outbound HTTP traffic to an arbitrary proxy server via acrafted Proxy header in an HTTP request, aka an "httpoxy" issue.

criterions.comment: yaws: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
